00036  * libcfs/include/libcfs/curproc.h

00038  * Lustre curproc API declaration
00039  *
00040  * Author: Nikita Danilov <nikita@clusterfs.com>

00043 #ifndef __LIBCFS_CURPROC_H__
00044 #define __LIBCFS_CURPROC_H__
00045 
00046 #ifndef HAVE_UIDGID_HEADER
00047 
00048 #ifndef _LINUX_UIDGID_H
00049 #define _LINUX_UIDGID_H
00050 
00051 typedef uid_t kuid_t;
00052 typedef gid_t kgid_t;
00053 
00054 #define INVALID_UID     -1
00055 #define INVALID_GID     -1
00056 
00057 #define GLOBAL_ROOT_UID  0
00058 #define GLOBAL_ROOT_GID  0
00059 
00060 static inline uid_t __kuid_val(kuid_t uid)
00061 {
00062         return uid;
00063 }
00064 
00065 static inline gid_t __kgid_val(kgid_t gid)
00066 {
00067         return gid;
00068 }
00069 
00070 static inline kuid_t make_kuid(struct user_namespace *from, uid_t uid)
00071 {
00072         return uid;
00073 }
00074 
00075 static inline kgid_t make_kgid(struct user_namespace *from, gid_t gid)
00076 {
00077         return gid;
00078 }
00079 
00080 static inline uid_t from_kuid(struct user_namespace *to, kuid_t uid)
00081 {
00082         return uid;
00083 }
00084 
00085 static inline gid_t from_kgid(struct user_namespace *to, kgid_t gid)
00086 {
00087         return gid;
00088 }
00089 
00090 static inline bool uid_eq(kuid_t left, kuid_t right)
00091 {
00092         return left == right;
00093 }
00094 
00095 static inline bool uid_valid(kuid_t uid)
00096 {
00097         return uid != (typeof(uid))INVALID_UID;
00098 }
00099 
00100 static inline bool gid_valid(kgid_t gid)
00101 {
00102         return gid != (typeof(gid))INVALID_GID;
00103 }
00104 #endif /* _LINUX_UIDGID_H */
00105 
00106 #endif
00107 
00108 int cfs_get_environ(const char *key, char *value, int *val_len);
00109 
00110 typedef __u32 cfs_cap_t;
00111 
00112 #define CFS_CAP_CHOWN                   0
00113 #define CFS_CAP_DAC_OVERRIDE            1
00114 #define CFS_CAP_DAC_READ_SEARCH         2
00115 #define CFS_CAP_FOWNER                  3
00116 #define CFS_CAP_FSETID                  4
00117 #define CFS_CAP_LINUX_IMMUTABLE         9
00118 #define CFS_CAP_SYS_ADMIN              21
00119 #define CFS_CAP_SYS_BOOT               23
00120 #define CFS_CAP_SYS_RESOURCE           24
00121 
00122 #define CFS_CAP_FS_MASK ((1 << CFS_CAP_CHOWN) |                 \
00123                          (1 << CFS_CAP_DAC_OVERRIDE) |          \
00124                          (1 << CFS_CAP_DAC_READ_SEARCH) |       \
00125                          (1 << CFS_CAP_FOWNER) |                \
00126                          (1 << CFS_CAP_FSETID ) |               \
00127                          (1 << CFS_CAP_LINUX_IMMUTABLE) |       \
00128                          (1 << CFS_CAP_SYS_ADMIN) |             \
00129                          (1 << CFS_CAP_SYS_BOOT) |              \
00130                          (1 << CFS_CAP_SYS_RESOURCE))
00131 
00132 void cfs_cap_raise(cfs_cap_t cap);
00133 void cfs_cap_lower(cfs_cap_t cap);
00134 int cfs_cap_raised(cfs_cap_t cap);
00135 cfs_cap_t cfs_curproc_cap_pack(void);
00136 void cfs_curproc_cap_unpack(cfs_cap_t cap);
00137 int cfs_capable(cfs_cap_t cap);
00138 
00139 /* __LIBCFS_CURPROC_H__ */
00140 #endif
